product_name: Nite Ize GearTies - Assorted Bulk - Package of 8
long_description: This assortment of 8 Nite Ize GearTies is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber with a strong bendable interior wire. They wrap, tie and organize cords, devices and tools with a simple twist.
short_description: This assortment of 8 Nite Ize GearTies is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber with a strong bendable interior wire. They wrap, tie and organize cords, devices and tools with a simple twist.
